Profile

Mark Rickerby is a creative and technical leader with more than 10 years experience creating web applications and publishing projects for startups, entrepreneurs, small businesses and large organisations.

He has extraordinary knowledge of widely used object oriented programming languages, API design and systems architecture; and the unique ability to dive into specialist areas of knowledge and build meaningful pictures of complex domains.

Mark has led the technical development of commercially successful API platforms for Bigcommerce and Flicks. He also has extensive experience with e-commerce, payments and shipping services, having worked with online business operations in Australia, New Zealand and Germany.

In a previous era of the web, Mark worked as a frontend developer, contributing to award winning websites including NewZealand.com and Te Ara; and in the era before that, he worked in Wellingtonâ€™s entertainment and student media, publishing gig guides, music reviews, comic art and electronica.
